close_edit_btn_title.message: Exit editing without saving any changes.

favorite_btn_title.message: Favorite this set so that it appears at the top of your list.

typ_sup_toggle_title.message: Enable or disable automatic comma and hashtag placing when editing sets.

save_close_toggle_title.message: Enable or disable closing the edit menu when you save.

export_btn_title.message: Save all your sets into a json file.

reset_settings_btn_title.message: Reset your settings and keybinds to default values.

keybinds_btn_title.message: Edit key combination which activate shortcuts.

close_settings_btn_title.message: Exit, your changes have been saved automatically.

save_keybind_title.message: Choose which keys save when editing. (Default: Enter)

back_keybind_title.message: Choose which keys go back to the previous menu. (Default: Escape)

new_keybind_title.message: Choose which keys create a new set. (Default: Control+n)

edit_keybind_title.message: Choose which keys edit the selected set. (Default: Control+e)

delete_keybind_title.message: Choose which keys delete the selected set. (Default: Control+d)

favorite_keybind_title.message: Choose which keys favorite the set you are editing. (Default: Control+f)

no_sets_message.message: You dont have any sets saved
